item.title: Crewmember Interphone Systems Upper Deck Call and Communication System – Courier/ Supernumerary Alerting System Operative

numlitem.para: Courier/ Supernumerary System is operative, and
Alternate procedures are established and used.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: The Captain or designee will verbally brief supernumeraries on alternate communication procedures.

placard.para: Placard Crewmember Interphone System Flight Deck to Ground "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
